links.*: The Return of the King (1980 film)

wikitext.*:
'''Jules Bass''' ([[16 September|September 16]], [[1935]] - [[25 October|October 25]] [[2022]]<ref>{{webcite|author=E.J. Panaligan|articleurl=https://variety.com/2022/film/news/jules-bass-dead-rudolph-the-red-nosed-reindeer-1235414059/|articlename=Jules Bass, Producer and Director Known for ‘Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer,’ ‘Frosty the Snowman,’ Dies at 87|dated=25 October 2022|website=[https://variety.com/ Variety]|accessed=26 October 2022}}</ref>) was an American director, producer and composer. Along with fellow director [[Arthur Rankin Jr.]], they founded the [[Rankin/Bass]] production company. He and Rankin were the directors and producers of the animated adaptation of ''[[The Hobbit (1977 film)|The Hobbit]]'' in 1977 and ''[[The Return of the King (1980 film)|The Return of the King]]'' in 1980.

==Awards==
* [[1977]] - ''[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peabody_Award Peabody Award]'', Best Movie, [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]]
